VERSE 3: The L[D]ord has promised g[G/D]ood to [D]me His word my hope sec[A/D]ures He w[D]ill my sh[D/F#]ield and p[G]ortion b[D]e As long as [A/D]life end[D]ures
VERSE 4: The [D]earth shall soon diss[G/D]olve like sn[D]ow The sun forbear to sh[A/D]ine But G[D]od who [D/F#]called me h[G]ere bel[D]ow Will be for[A/D]ever m[D]ine Will be for[A/D]ever m[D]ine Will be for[A/D]ever m[D]ine
